::Shredder::

Seeing Quickstrike run in, Shredder is about to follow when the autogun on 
the wall nearly blows his head off. He shoots back, destroying the autogun, 
and then turns to Tarantulus.

"What is going on?" he asks, aiming his gun at the spider as he sees the door 
close. He growls, opening fire on the wall to the left of the door, nearly 
blowing through it.
